description.short: Useful in Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), peptic ulcers, dyspepsia, nausea, and vomiting.
description.long: This tablet combines Rabeprazole, a proton pump inhibitor, and Domperidone, a prokinetic agent, to address digestive disorders comprehensively. Rabeprazole reduces excess stomach acid, preventing heartburn and allowing ulcers to heal, while Domperidone enhances gastric motility, preventing nausea and ensuring smooth digestion. The enteric-coated formulation ensures effective absorption of Rabeprazole in the intestines, maximizing its efficacy. This tablet provides long-lasting relief from acidity, bloating, and other digestive issues, making it a trusted solution for improving gastrointestinal health and overall comfort in patients with chronic or acute symptoms.

usage.instructions: Take this medication by mouth as directed by your doctor. Do not increase your dose or use this drug more often or for longer than prescribed.
usage.side_effects: Headache, Diarrhea or Constipation, Dry Mouth, Abdominal Pain or Cramps, Dizziness or Drowsiness.
usage.precautions: Always use this medication as prescribed by a licensed healthcare professional to ensure its safe and effective application.

description.short: Useful in pain relief, inflammation, fever, osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, and post-surgical swelling.
description.long: This tablet combines Aceclofenac, Paracetamol, and Serratiopeptidase for effective pain management and anti-inflammatory action. Aceclofenac, a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID), reduces inflammation and provides relief from joint and muscle pain. Paracetamol acts as a mild pain reliever and fever reducer, enhancing the overall effect. Serratiopeptidase, an enzyme, reduces swelling and helps in faster recovery of damaged tissues. This combination is widely used to manage conditions like arthritis, musculoskeletal pain, and post-operative swelling, offering quick and long-lasting relief. The tablet is well-suited for patients with moderate to severe pain and inflammation.

usage.instructions: Take this medication by mouth as directed by your doctor. Do not increase your dose or use this drug more often or for longer than prescribed.
usage.side_effects: Nausea, stomach discomfort, diarrhea, dizziness, and heartburn. In some cases, patients might experience drowsiness or skin rash. These effects are usually temporary and subside as the body adjusts to the medication. If side effects persist or worsen, consulting a doctor is recommended.
usage.precautions: Always take this medication as prescribed by a healthcare professional for safe and effective results.

description.short: Useful in gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), acid reflux, dyspepsia, peptic ulcers, nausea, and vomiting.
description.long: This tablet combines Pantoprazole, a proton pump inhibitor, and Domperidone in a sustained-release (SR) form for effective management of digestive disorders. Pantoprazole works by reducing the production of stomach acid, providing relief from heartburn, acid reflux, and ulcers. Domperidone enhances gastrointestinal motility, promoting smooth digestion and preventing nausea or vomiting caused by delayed stomach emptying. The sustained-release formulation ensures prolonged action, offering extended relief throughout the day. This combination is widely used to treat chronic digestive conditions, improving patient comfort and preventing complications related to excess stomach acid.

usage.instructions: Take this medication by mouth as directed by your doctor. Do not increase your dose or use this drug more often or for longer than prescribed.
usage.side_effects: Nausea, headache, dry mouth, abdominal discomfort, diarrhea, or constipation. Some patients might experience dizziness or flatulence. These effects are typically mild and temporary, resolving as the body adjusts to the medication. If they persist or worsen, consult your doctor.
usage.precautions: Always take this medication as prescribed by a healthcare professional for safe and effective results.

L-Arginine and N-Acetylcysteine are known for their antioxidant properties and support blood circulation, while Chasteberry Extract and Tribulus Terrestris promote hormonal balance and reproductive health. Inositol, Green Tea Extract, and Evening Primrose Extract provide antioxidant benefits and help improve metabolism, skin health, and energy levels. Essential vitamins like Vitamin D3, Vitamin E, and Vitamin C support immune function and skin health. Iron, Zinc, Magnesium, and Copper are important for boosting energy, metabolism, and maintaining healthy bones and tissues. This combination is ideal for those looking for a holistic health supplement to improve vitality, manage stress, and boost immunity.

description.short: Useful in gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), peptic ulcers, dyspepsia, nausea, vomiting, and functional dyspepsia.
description.long: This tablet combines Rabeprazole Sodium, a proton pump inhibitor (PPI), and Levosulpiride, a prokinetic agent. Rabeprazole works by reducing stomach acid production, providing relief from heartburn, acid reflux, and helping in the healing of peptic ulcers. Levosulpiride improves gastrointestinal motility and reduces nausea or vomiting caused by delayed gastric emptying or digestive issues. The extended-release (SR) formulation of Levosulpiride ensures sustained therapeutic effects. This combination is often prescribed for individuals suffering from GERD, chronic indigestion, and other gastrointestinal disorders, improving comfort and digestion by addressing both acid production and motility issues.

usage.instructions: Take this medication by mouth as directed by your doctor. Do not increase your dose or use this drug more often or for longer than prescribed.

description.short: Useful in bone health, calcium and vitamin D3 deficiency, osteoporosis, joint health, immune support, and overall vitality.
description.long: This combination of Calcitriol, Calcium Citrate Malate, Vitamin K2-7, Methylcobalamin, Zinc, Magnesium, and L-Methyl Folate is designed to support bone health, improve calcium absorption, and enhance overall well-being. Calcitriol helps regulate calcium and phosphorus levels, ensuring proper bone mineralization. Calcium Citrate Malate provides easily absorbed calcium, essential for bone strength. Vitamin K2-7 promotes calcium deposition in bones while preventing arterial calcification. Methylcobalamin supports nerve health and energy production, while Magnesium and Zinc are vital for maintaining strong bones and supporting metabolic functions. L-Methyl Folate, the bioactive form of folic acid, aids in cell repair and red blood cell production. This combination is ideal for individuals with weakened bones, calcium deficiency, or those looking to enhance their overall bone health.

usage.instructions: Take this medication by mouth as directed by your doctor. Do not increase your dose or use this drug more often or for longer than prescribed.
usage.side_effects: Stomach upset, bloating, or diarrhea, especially in individuals with sensitive stomachs. Some people may experience headache, dizziness, or mild allergic reactions such as skin rashes. These side effects are usually temporary and resolve as the body adjusts. If side effects persist or worsen, it is advised to consult a healthcare provider.
usage.precautions: Follow your healthcare provider's guidance to ensure the safe use of this supplement.

description.short: Useful in cough with mucus, bronchitis, asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), and respiratory tract infections.
description.long: This syrup combines Levosalbutamol, Ambroxol, and Guaiphenesin to provide effective relief from productive cough and respiratory congestion. Levosalbutamol is a bronchodilator that relaxes airway muscles, making breathing easier in conditions like asthma and bronchitis. Ambroxol acts as a mucolytic, breaking down and thinning mucus, facilitating its easy removal. Guaiphenesin is an expectorant that loosens and clears phlegm from the airways, promoting productive coughing. This combination is ideal for individuals suffering from respiratory conditions with thick mucus, ensuring better airway clearance and easier breathing. The syrup is especially beneficial in managing conditions associated with mucus build-up in the lungs and throat.

usage.instructions: Take this medication by mouth as directed by your doctor. Do not increase your dose or use this drug more often or for longer than prescribed.
usage.side_effects: Dizziness, headache, dry mouth, or a mild tremor. Some individuals might experience stomach upset, diarrhea, or a metallic taste in the mouth. These effects are generally mild and resolve on their own. If they persist or worsen, consult a healthcare provider.
usage.precautions: Always use this medication under medical guidance for safe and effective treatment of respiratory conditions.

description.short: Useful in digestive disorders, indigestion, loss of appetite, bloating, flatulence, vitamin deficiencies, and general weakness.
description.long: This syrup combines Fungal Diastase and Pepsin with essential B vitamins to improve digestion and overall nutritional status. Fungal Diastase is an enzyme that breaks down carbohydrates, aiding in the digestion of complex food. Pepsin helps in protein breakdown, supporting efficient nutrient absorption. The inclusion of Vitamin B1, B2, B6, B12, Niacinamide, and D-Panthenol enhances metabolic activities, supports nerve function, and boosts energy production. This syrup is beneficial for managing conditions like indigestion, appetite loss, and vitamin B deficiencies, making it suitable for people recovering from illnesses, experiencing dietary deficiencies, or requiring digestive support.

description.short: Useful in indigestion, bloating, flatulence, loss of appetite, digestive disorders, gastrointestinal discomfort, and vitamin B deficiencies.
description.long: This dry syrup is a combination of Lactic Bacillus, Diastase, Pepsin, Simethicone, and essential vitamins to improve digestion and overall well-being. Lactic Bacillus helps restore healthy gut flora, supporting digestion and reducing gastrointestinal issues. Diastase and Pepsin act as digestive enzymes to break down starches and proteins, aiding nutrient absorption. Simethicone relieves bloating and gas by reducing surface tension of gas bubbles in the gut. The inclusion of Vitamin B Complex, L-Lysine, and Folic Acid boosts metabolism, promotes appetite, and supports overall nutritional health. This formulation is ideal for addressing digestive imbalances, improving nutrient uptake, and enhancing overall vitality in both children and adults.

usage.precautions: Always use this dry syrup under medical guidance to ensure safe and effective results for digestive and nutritional support.
